p: Phenolic compounds are known to act as antioxidants with beneficial effects on various diseases. Phenolics can prevent the development of cardiovascular diseases, cataracts, cancers, reduce fat absorption, and positively affect metabolism [ 62]. The potential antioxidant capacity, as well as other pharmacological activities of Iris rhizomes crude extracts, were evaluated in several bioassays reflecting the traditional use of Iris rhizomes against infection, liver, and inflammatory diseases.
